title: Warning when compiling on ppc64le
body_html:
I get this warning when I try to compile on a Power8 system (CUDA 8, cudnn 7)

THCNumerics.cuh(38): warning: integer conversion resulted in a change of sign

I generally get paranoid when integers change sign. On the other hand, compilers are really good at separating errors from warnings. Should I ignore this?
body_text:

body:
I get this warning when I try to compile on a Power8 system (CUDA 8, cudnn 7)
```
THCNumerics.cuh(38): warning: integer conversion resulted in a change of sign
```

I generally get paranoid when integers change sign. On the other hand, compilers are really good at separating errors from warnings. Should I ignore this?
